Author: lotsofsqs
Text: No advice really, just solidarity. Mom had BN before I was born and then pulled it together while raising us. But now that’s we are out of the house, I think she’s developed orthorexia. I just have to remind myself: she’s an adult. She can take care of herself just as I have myself. I did mention it to her once and she was like, “what?? That’s not me.” And maybe she’s right. I dunno.

Author: Rivka90
Text: I'm sorry you're going through this with a parent.. I hope you find some support irl.
